title: Alzheimer's Association gives voice to early-stage patients in Alzheimer's awareness month campaign
author: Natalie Missakian
description: At 56, with sun-kissed skin, long blond locks and a bright smile, Deborah Jobe appears to be the picture of health. So people are often surprised when she tells them she's living with dementia. | At 56, Deborah Jobe appears to be the picture of health. So people are often surprised when she tells them she's living with dementia. She shares her story as part of a new Alzheimer's Association awareness campaign.
